website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy fabric bands prevent the slipping and snapping that often comes with rubber versions.
pros: Three-pack of fabric bands made from a cotton/polyester blend
Stitched to prevent damage or breakage
Slight nonstick coating helps keep bands in place
cons: Bands may still slide if you don't start with legs far enough apart

customer_reviews.title: 4.5/5 - Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Watch my video reviews in HD on my Youtube channel: skyforce95 Pros: -comes with three resistance bands with varying elasticity - so there is definitely one that will work for your fitness level -material is easy to clean -interior lining has silicone for good grip on your legs -the material does not pinch your skin when expanding and retracting - can't say the same for other cheap resistance bands -comes with a mesh carrying pouch for easy storage and travel Cons: -material has a strong odor when you first unbox it, but it goes away as time goes by
customer_reviews.author: skyforce95

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set and Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this set! I've seen comparable sets got for 2-4x the cost. They are extremity well made, durable with heavy duty double stitching. They are also mark with the resistance level for easy color coding. The bands have a nice non-slip inside that keeps them in place comfortably. There is also a get started exercise guide and drawstring mesh carrying/storage bag. I would highly recommend these to anyone who is looking for a great basic set!
customer_reviews.author: J and M Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Workout resistance band
customer_reviews.text: Let’s just say this thing has been giving me a workout!! I skipped straight to exercising with the medium (pink) resistance band because it gave me more of a workout than the light (Green). These resistance bands are super strong and well made, the fabric that it’s made with is very durable. I washed it about two times and let it air dry. The band fabric did not unravel, it snapped right back to its regular size. This resistance band is perfect since I don’t have dumbbells. I just use this on my arms, hips and legs and it gives me a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality booty bands at great price point
customer_reviews.text: Great booty bands! These are thick, great quality material that stays put while in use during various exercises. A small booklet came with suggested exercises but there are plenty of good resources online for more complete moves & useage. The different strengths are clearly marked on the bands so I don’t have to remember which color is light, medium or heavy. It came with a mesh carrying case that would make packing into a bag convenient to bring to the gym or while traveling, though these will be a good addition to our home gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good for thigh work
customer_reviews.text: Used these once so far and they seem pretty good. Not really the way I had hoped, but as described I guess. I use loops for Beachbody workouts and I was hoping these would be a good alternative. They are great for exercises using them on your thighs, but that's about it. The latex/rubber (or whatever they're made of) stretch out in time and annoyingly roll up when you move, and eventually get holes. I've replaced them a couple of times and was hoping these would be a good replacement. Not so much... I like them for the thigh work though!
customer_reviews.author: Tlars

customer_reviews.title: I love these bands!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for some resistance bands that 1) stay in place 2) do not burn my legs with the friction. These are great. They are not made with plastic therefore they won't burn. They do not slip and they are very comfortable to use. This set is great as you can use each band depending on the workout and the weight you want to have. I recommend these to anyone that wears shorts during the workouts or for men that have hairy legs as these will not be pulling any hair out of you lol.
customer_reviews.author: Doryys Leal

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition (plus size approved)
customer_reviews.text: These are very thick and durable, but still stretch. They came with a mesh bag & booklet that shows you exercises you can do (very helpful, thanks). I’m a bigger girl, so i struggled a bit pulling these up but i got them up and loved them. I workout from home so I have a little gym in my garage so these were a great addition. I loved the colors, they were cute. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dyana

customer_reviews.title: Love these bands!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am someone that doesn't have time to go to the gym. But these bands incorporate perfectly into my daily at-home workout. The resistance on these bands is amazing. I am a 6' 1" 220lb male, and I highly doubted the strength of these bands at first. However, they are incredibly resilient. The highest intensity band is very difficult to flex to max potential, which I love. I have had workout bands like this where the max band feels like stretching a rubber band, but this is perfect. Watch out Kim Kardashian, another supreme is rising!
customer_reviews.author: Austin McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and effective
customer_reviews.text: I use resistance bands pretty frequently during my workouts, but I usually have ones that I tie to different lengths as needed. These are super convenient as they are sewn together and I don’t have to worry about adjusting the length. They are perfect for hip exercises and stay in place very well on shorts or directly on skin without being uncomfortable. Latex bands tend to irritate my skin and these do not. They have plenty of resistance, the heavy band is definitely a challenge. I don’t know that they would work well for arms or upper body exercises, but they are designed well for lower body. I’ve really enjoyed these!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home and travel. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: These are super neat! I had been wanting to try resistance bands and decided to take the plunge since I was unable to go to the gym. These come with a drawstring carrying bag and booklet that gives you exercise ideas. There are also TONS of ideas on Pinterest for these. I know the booklet says hip bands but so far I’ve worked my arms, abs and hips with them. I’m thinking these will be great for my travel bag too when I have to go on business trips.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Resistance in Bands!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bands because they don't roll and they come with a travel mesh bag for them. The light band has a good resistance, the medium band has a jump in resistance that's a challenge, and the heavy band has a resistance that's straight up impossible to move. However, you could work your way up to the heavy band, but I don't think it's for beginners. I recommend this product. It's perfect for me during quarantine with my gym closed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hassin

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Received these resistance bands about 5 days ago and love them! They are great quality, very durable I've used the rubber resistance bands in the past and they always rolled up and were very uncomfortable to use. I do not have that problem with these. They're great to use with cardio workouts or light weights. The package comes with 3 different bands, light, medium, and heavy. It always comes with a mesh bag to carry them in when you're on the go and even includes a small booklet with different workouts you can do with them. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Eskander

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The bands come in 3 sizes and depending on the person determines which band to use. Like with most things in life, start small and work your way up. It has 3 different stretches, from the less resistance to the most resistance. Again, if you are new to this type of workout, start with the less resistance. Not much wiggle room with the bands as the resistance gets tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Scruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout!
customer_reviews.text: I have used rubber resistance bands in the past, but they always rolled up/down and pinched my skin. These bands are made of soft fabric and elastic. I love that the set comes with 3 levels-light, medium, & heavy so you can move up or down in resistance, as needed. The mesh carrying bag and small booklet with exercises are excellent for travel. I felt my muscles burning in just a few minutes, but they stayed in place the entire workout!
customer_reviews.author: LakeLover

customer_reviews.title: No slipping! And they look super cute : )
customer_reviews.text: These bring my home workout up another level. For a floor workout, these are really useful for upping the strength needed. I really love that they are such pretty colors also. They stay where you put them with a non-slip band on the inside. Comfortable to use other than the burning muscles from using them : )
customer_reviews.author: Angel44fire

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness and the colors. I used to use the rubberized ones and those always slipped around and attracted a lot of dust. It comes with a nice mesh bag to help ventilate and how thick the band is makes me feel like I’m putting in the extra work!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wong

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Not easily used on larger individuals.
customer_reviews.text: Excited to workout with these. They have a very durable feel to them and nice stretch. I’m not a super big person (US size 6, 135-140#) so I can get the bands around both feet and up to just above my knees, I would not say these are big enough for a larger person to get both legs in. So keep that in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: KK2Vine

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I purchased these. I read a lot of reviews and felt like these were going to be a great choice and they really were. These work so great. They are a nice thick band. They do not roll down at all. I sweat everywhere when I work out and I put this band on pretty slippeey legs ans it went nowhere. I love these bands so much. Yoi will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayeshah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I am a personal trainer and these are exactly what I was looking for. The material seems very durable. Great buy too since I usually see these selling for twice as much. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra martinez

customer_reviews.title: great bands, especially for leg day!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they were recommended from a friend, during this quarentine, working out is a challenge esp when you need more weights and there are none! These bands certainly do the trick. I use the light band for exercises where I just need a little more resistance due to not enough weights. I use the medium for the workouts with just resistance and they are SO COMFORTABLE and more importantly, they do not roll like the other rubber ones do!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great High Intensity Resistance Bands
customer_reviews.text: I love using these bands when I walk for greater resistance and for exercises targeting the glutes and hamstrings. They're thick and durable, with no potential for roll up. The lightest tension is pretty tight, so if you're just starting to use resistance bands, you might want to buy a lighter latex style set as well. I have these too and alternate between them, depending on the intensity of the workout.
customer_reviews.author: CChristian

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft against skin
customer_reviews.text: I like that these resistance bands don't irritate my skin. The bands I used to use had a rough texture. These are perfect. They are also great to use when traveling. Can be folded up and will even fit in your purse, Gym bag, or carry on luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Comes with 3 different ones
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my friend because she likes to workout at home so these are perfect for her. She said the first one is a good starting strength for her as an average non athletic person. She gets sore the next day from the workout and she said it felt great! She will be using this with yoga as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving using these resistant bands in my workouts. Great stretch and durability and I love that I can use these in shorts and not have any issues like with the classic elastic ones that pull on my skin. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bands. Unlike another set that look similar, these are actually different resistance levels & not sizes. These are perfect for my at home workout since I don’t plan on going to the gym anytime soon. I’d definitely recommend this set to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!! I’m not a small woman and trying to find resistance bands that fit around my calfs and thighs having quite the challenge. And I really really want it to find resistant bands as I’m trying to add strength training to my on going weight loss journey. I’m 5’7” and currently weigh 254lbs down from 289lbs. These Resistance bands work for me, unlike others that just rolled and twisted up as I attempted to use them, these ones stay in place and are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! They stay in place excellently! And my other bands I always used heavy AND medium... with these the Medium is strong and the heavy alone is perfect! Gives me room to get stronger working smarter not harder! I haven’t had them long so we will see how long they last but so far they seem like they will last me a very very long time
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: my new fav bands...my old rubber ones are going to be put away!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the band is thick and sturdy. Wprkong from home, I keep the band on and do my quick work outs during breaks or walk with the band and it doesn't bend at all. It doesn't dig in either. Love it and the girly colors!
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it
customer_reviews.text: Its my first time using them. I thought it was going to be way more difficult but for my surprise not a at all. Very easy to use, come un a little bar to take with you. Material es strong but feels good not rough.
customer_reviews.author: EMGutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Such great bands! I’ve bought many in the past and am very impressed by these. They are high quality, durable and I love the colors! I also love that it comes with a little carry bag that fits all three perfectly. Overall great product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & New
customer_reviews.text: I’m new with using bands so I like that this came with photos on different ways to use them. I also like the multi pack because I can keep one in my suitcase since I travel a lot, one at home and an extra! The colors are fun too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: So far no complaints! Great durability & works perfect with my workouts :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid gym goer for about 12 years. Being that gyms are still closed within my county & state I have had to make workout modifications and thank goodness for my 8 years of Personal training experience along with my Bikini competing background. I have used other brand bands that break over time or don't have good durability. Again, I only recently bought these bands but so far, they seem to adhere to my workouts and I have zero complaints! Safe to say I am a happy workout home goer and will be using this brand again in the future!!!! ;-) Sarita
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!m for great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Trying out these new exercise bands which come in 3 resistances. The quality is amazing and when I tried them out, it did not have any issues with the band rolling down. I love the colors they come in as well as the small mesh bag included to store them in. Would definitely recommend purchasing these for home use, the gym and even travel!
customer_reviews.author: Arlen Grajeda

customer_reviews.title: Is super confortable and resistance
customer_reviews.text: I really Love it, when I got it, I started exercise is comfortable and resistance. De veras que si son muy buena calidad y no se enrollan como las de plástico, muy buena decisión hice. Gracias 😊 y delivery it was super fast 💕
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and convenient to carry
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to store and carry with you. I will enjoy being able to take these camping with me. They are so easy to use and you feel like you are getting a good workout. I would recommend these to anyone who loves working out with bands.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, durable, dont roll like plastic
customer_reviews.text: these are great bands, thank you. they are great. dont roll like the plastic ones. they are a bit stronger than the plastic ones, so you have to work a little harder, when doing standing leg work for example. but it is worth it. would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the bands the quality is to cheap and they have a nasty smell I don’t recommend is product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best resistance band i used🙂
customer_reviews.text: I thought this prodect was perfect. I have no complaints on it. Does everything that I wanted to work my abs,my glutes.You really feel the durability. I tried the light and I tried the meduim That exercise routine was perfect. No complaints here love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these resistance bands. You can use these them at home or the gym. It comes with a mesh bag to carry them everywhere you want too. While a lot of gyms are closed these have really come in handy. You don’t have to worry about them rolling down when you are using them. It comes in 3 different levels light, medium, heavy. For the price quality and price you can’t beat it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SNL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Nonslip
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the most durable bands i've used! I've used a lot of latex ones in the past and they slip very easily off of your body. Because these are thicker and come in 3 different styles of weight (light, medium, heavy) you can pick what you are comfortable with and make sure that it will not slip off of your legs whether you are wearing pants or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Denninger

customer_reviews.title: Great workout for hips, butt, and thighs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It comes with 3 resistance levels: light, medium, and heavy. I am using the light and medium and I can feel the muscles working. I'll have to work up to the heavy. Great for a quick workout at home or when traveling. Packs up small in the carrying case. Seems very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: These bands are very easy to use. With 3 different levels of stretch they are great for all fitness levels beginner to advanced. They come with a mesh bag for storing them and for taking on the go. Also included is a card with some exercises to get you started. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TnTsmama

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The bands were a little stiffer that what I expected but once I put them on and tried them I was pleasantly surprised. They did the job and they did it well. My son was impressed when using them for squats.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P.

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bands that don’t roll up!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love that these bands don’t roll up while working out. Cute colors and they have the strength (light, medium and heavy) labeled on the bands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VSTEERE

customer_reviews.title: durable, effective, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used resistance bands before and have been looking for some to try. These are really great, and they're inexpensive which was a plus. They don't slide down when I'm using them! They feel really durable. Comes with a heavy, medium, and light (stretch), a mesh storage bag, and an insert with some exercises to try. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in muscle resistance training
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just started trying to do some muscle strength training and these bands have been a great help in resistance training! I have some neck issues so I’ve been using them to strengthen muscles around my neck area. They’re very sturdy and don’t slip easily like some other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara gentry

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the stretch 5 stars because it’s the amount of stretch that I want (which is not a lot they are resistance bands. I love the colors and they are super well made. I think the sellers photos make them look a little thin but they aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Better than rubber bands! Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! Way better than the rubber bands!!! Def worth every dollar look no further buy these , best value best quality great price great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance, good price
customer_reviews.text: I use bands all the time during my workouts. These are very resistant giving me good tension to build strength and stability. I also love they don’t roll!! My others roll and can be really annoying
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I can take it to work with me, or anywhere! It comes with an exercise instruction manual and a nice little mesh carrying case. I haven’t graduated to the medium or heavy bands yet, but the light ones offer plenty of resistance. Well made and durable
customer_reviews.author: micaela

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I can definitely feel the bands working with every squat. It was very helpful to get a guide on what types of exercises to use them with. I can't wait to see the results!
customer_reviews.author: K.Berry

customer_reviews.title: Durable with cute colors
customer_reviews.text: These bands will be a great addition to home workouts. I’ve only used them for a week so far, but they seem like they’ll hold up nicely. They came with a handy pamphlet that has some exercises listed in it, along with a travel mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: meerkat44

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Does what they are advertised and feel comfortable. They are a little loose on my thighs, but hoping to grow into them as I get SWOL. Bought them to do inner and outer thigh exercises to reduce sciatic pain from a piriformis muscle problem. It’s working
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bokach

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and colors !
customer_reviews.text: These are the best resistance bands over ever bought . The material on the back is perfect for not allowing them to scrunch up. I use all three during my workout for different workouts. They are colorful and versatile. I also like that they do not have Velcro. The material makes them easy to wash too!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Behill

customer_reviews.title: These are Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I work out with bands a few times a week and these are by far the best bands I have used. The do not pinch your skin, they are strong, and Look like the will last much longer than traditional bands.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: No slip resistance bands!! Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great resistance bands to use for daily workouts. Made out of durable material, the three bands are different levels to include light, medium and heavy. The bands stay in place while performing workouts. Come with a great travel bag for days when we are on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine schilling

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile! Love them for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love these bands. They are thick, durable, and don't slip. I do a lot of BB workouts and prefer these bands over the plastic ones. They also have a little mesh bag to store them in. We spend a lot of time traveling which they are great for. I have use them when we are on the road in our motorhome (see pictured).
customer_reviews.author: Pentz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Used these everyday since I’ve got them.. this product is comparable to the kbands brand. And they come with a cute carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very sturdy bands. There is an obvious difference in intensity, and all bands are also labeled. Comes with a mesh storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Great for doing leg workouts. Plus especially nice for working out while traveling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Resistance Bands Offer Great Performance & Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for a set with 3 levels of resistance. They maintain their resistance and thanks to the anti slip feature, the don’t slide or bind. Any ladies who are a little thicker in the thigh like myself, you can use all of the bands with no problem. Even my husband is impressed with the level of resistance and the workout we get using the bands on our legs and arms!
customer_reviews.author: Chaundra Mangum-Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to your workouts!
customer_reviews.text: These bands feel sturdy yet comfortable to use. The bands did not run uncomfortably and definitely added some challenge to the workout. Lightweight and convenient carry bag to take with you and to store.
customer_reviews.author: Rowlands1155

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was very nice and good quality. Bands have nice resistance and are comfortable to use. Definitely a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cassie L

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. I like the option of of variable tension strengths. Grip line inside so they do not slip down.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Espineta

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bands!
customer_reviews.text: Bands are such a good workout! These are so much better then the rubber ones. Super comfy and they don’t leave marks on my skin like the rubber ones do. Easy to take with me anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and get the better set of resistance bands.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made compared to previously purchased bands. There’s no discernible difference in tension between the 3 bands.
customer_reviews.author: Jonith Breadon MD

customer_reviews.title: She likes them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she is happy with the bands. She said they are comfortable and use to put on no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: JArbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Saaaaay Whaaaat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are FABULOUS!!!! They do not I repeat they do not slip. Dont even second guess it. BUY THESE! U wont b disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Wayyy to big for someone smaller. Couldn’t even go on normal walks with them without them falling off
customer_reviews.author: Carly Heinlein

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These came with 3 bands- easy, medium and hard. I am able to use all 3 depending on the workouts I am doing! I love how they are made of a tight fabric rather then the rubber ones, because it keeps them from rolling up your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily De Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Best Resistance Bands I've Purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I love that they're all the same length, but different resistance. They're thick and sturdy, unlike the elastic ones that just roll up on your thighs 🙄 I am very satisfied with this purchase 👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: amazing quality for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I love to find new ways to workout and tone my body! These resistance bands are my new favorite workout buddy!!!!! Easy to use and very durable when working out! The resistance bands also included a velcro strap that allows you to easily fit the bands to your body type which is exactly what I was looking for! I would highly recommend CFX brand and their resistance bands.
customer_reviews.author: kealee

customer_reviews.title: Durable, strong and portable
customer_reviews.text: These bands are very durable! They are strong but flexible. Perfect for working out at home or on the go (comes with a small travel bag that’s very easy to take with you).
customer_reviews.author: Shantel Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bands!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my resistance bands. You get 3 different sizes. I just love the grip on the inside of the bands. Strong and durable. Excellent price. Other bands I’ve used tend to move and slip down, these stay in place. Also, very comfortable! Other bands hurt my legs and left marks. I have no pain or marks using these. You even get a mesh bag to store them. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super great product! Love the different levels of difficulty and the quality. They don’t slip when you wear them which is really nice when working out!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: These are a must buy!!! Period!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am kind of obsessed with these! They are sturdy, but stretchy and most important they do NOT ROLL DOWN!!!! Huge win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great Resistance!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made resistance bands. The fabric feels durable. I like that everything fits in the mesh bag nicely. Overall, these bands are perfect for a home workout
customer_reviews.author: Johnny J Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Theses work very well, they seem very durable. The carry case is a nice feature they fit well and would be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for resistance and deosn't take up much space. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wortmann

customer_reviews.title: it works great for all situations.
customer_reviews.text: i personally love that this product was made with care an that is was built to last. and it is very durable in all ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: Love these resistance bands. They are well made and hold up in a good workout. They come with a handy, soft bag so packing them in a gym bag or travel bag is easy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Atch

customer_reviews.title: Wanna work your booty? Get you some! e
customer_reviews.text: I just started using my resistance bands and they are awesome. Super strong and stay in place. Can totally feel the burn in the glutes. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for enhancing a workout
customer_reviews.text: Add a little tension in your relationship* by buying these. *note by relationship we mean workout
customer_reviews.author: Richard McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome resistance band set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this resistance band set. Great for use at home and for travel. Comes with 3 different resistances, a carry pouch and exercise instruction card. Great for all levels, durable material and love the colors too. Great value. Def recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tzoannopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are super awesome. The are SO durable and well made. Good quality bands and has a a carry bag included
customer_reviews.author: Kw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work out bands!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bands! They are very comfortable to be working out with. They have three sizes which is great light, medium and heavy. And also comes with some work outs to do while using them which was helpful! I definitely recommend these bands!
customer_reviews.author: Brenlynn

customer_reviews.title: Best resistance bands I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! They roll back up to fit into the mesh bag when your not using them. They are all the same size but with different resistance. These are much better than your typical resistance bands!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for the JOB!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved using these! Also, liked that it came in a baggy & a brochure on workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Baali

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have some of the thinner ones and hate how they always roll. I haven't had that problem with these at all. They stay where they are placed and have great resistance. Good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Family man

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They are so durable and easy to use. They come with their own carrying drawstring bag. They are very well made. I would highly recommend these bands!
customer_reviews.author: Misi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They dont roll up like some of the rubber ones do. Work really well and was exactly as advertised l.
customer_reviews.author: Rachmomo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for an amazing cost
customer_reviews.text: These products are GREAT for at home work outs, extra glute and leg workouts at the gym, and travel. They all fit in the little travel bag. They are amazing quality for the cost and they don’t slip when you are working out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise bands
customer_reviews.text: The bands are great! They do not fold over or ride up on my legs. Comfortable as well. I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ruperd

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I only had 1 resistance band prior to ordering these which was too heavy to do my workouts properly. These are just what I was looking for. I felt like goldilocks trying each of them out. The light one is REALLY LIGHT I don't think I'll use it. The medium is perfect for glute activation workouts. The heavy lives up to its name.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, effective, durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace standard resistance loops. These stay put--no bunching, slapping, rolling down the legs while exercising--and they're actually comfortable to wear (even with shorts). I've used them for indoor and outdoor workouts, sometimes twice a day, and they're holding up nicely. The travel/storage bag is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunzie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed to help out with my at home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: jlcadkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bands! You can definitely feel the difference they make when doing squats or any workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jenlewis28

customer_reviews.title: Great product that will promote great results!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bands! They fit comfortably on larger thighs without rolling down or creating painful indentations. I use them with my squat jumps, squat jacks, and so many other exercises. The colors are also, so aesthetically pleasing! I recommended them to my own trainer, and she was shooketh lol.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Brenae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love these workout bands! They have that cloth material so they don’t roll up on your legs. They also do not have a velcro strap to adjust the bands but that is a plus for me. I hate when I’m working out and then the strap detached. It comes with a little bag to put in.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and give a good workout for your legs.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these and likes that they're very thick and resistant but also have a stretch to them. They are good for at home bodyweight workouts or at the gym with weights.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Morgan

product_meta.title: CFX Resistance Bands 3 Sets, Premium Exercise Loops with Non-Slip Design for Hips & Glutes, 3 Resistance Level Workout Booty Bands for Women and Men, Best for Home Fitness, Yoga, Pilates
product_meta.description:
#1 Best Fabric Resistance Bands!
Are you ready for the most versatile, results producing workout bands on the market? 

These bands are ideal for:
- Sports
- Fitness
- Injury rehabilitation
- body shaping
- weight loss
- physical therapy

Our bands are the best quality among others. Why? 

First, our bands are made of the highest quality material (not rubber bands which are much cheaper and tend to break easily). They are stronger and able to stretch further. You will feel the same resistance after many reps. 
These bands are free of non-natural materials such as Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE) - TPE materials cost 30-40% less, are not gentle to skin and much less durable.
Moreover, our bands are comfortable, soft and easy on the skin. Our bands are also made from a fabric like material which prevents rolling, slipping or pinching during your workout.
Both of these involve a higher investment for us but we think it's worth it to create a better product.

What makes our resistance bands special? 

These bands are rigorously tested to be snap, roll & sweat resistant.
You get 3 levels bands and you can combine multiple bands to find your ideal resistance. These bands are so lightweight that they make a great travel fitness kit! 
This is also a great Christmas, Mother's and Father's day gift idea for men, women, dad or mom.
feature_bullets: ★【2019 Upgraded Resistance Band】- Durable and anti slip design resistance band is different from latex/rubber workout band. Our exercise band is made of high quality cotton polyester stretch fabric material, so the fitness bands will never slide or roll up when you use.

★【Safe Booty Bands, Will Not Break】- Strong and tight sewing method makes it Not Easy To Break. Our exercise band is much safer than latex one. Resistance hip bands works great by helping you perform squats correctly, keeping your knees pushed out.

★【Set of 3 levels Loop Bands】- The hip bands has 3 levels of resistance for choose, suitable for experienced athlete or just beginners for fitness training. Our Larger level resistance bands will fit more sports enthusiasts.

★【Portable And Efficient Loop Bands】- Lightweight resistance band with a storage bag makes it easy to bring them everywhere. You can have a efficient workout with this hip band wherever you go by doing leg and butt exercises, stretching, yoga,etc.

★【Wonderful After-sale Customer Service】- If you have a problem or need additional assistance, please let us know directly through Amazon. We are extremely honored to receive your suggestions for our products.
